text: Fascinus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Fascinus include: * Fascinus typicus Hedley, 1903 ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Fascinus (gastropod)
